price: 14. Diles: “Yo adoro solamente a Al-lah consagrando mi adoración sinceramente a Él.
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعۡبُدُ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُۥ دِينِي

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: quli al-laha aʿbudu mukh'liṣan lahu dīnī
